Reference version 0.1.0

Read PALMS data

read_palms

Read PALMS data from a csv file

Creating field tables

palms_load_defaults

Populates field and domain tables with default values

palms_add_domain

Add an aggregation domain to the palmsplus_domains table.

palms_add_field

Add an aggregation field to the palmsplus_fields table.

palms_add_multimodal_field

A a multimodal field to the multimodal_fields table

palms_add_trajectory_field

Add a trajectory field to the trajectory_fields table.

palms_add_trajectory_location

Add a trajectory location to the trajectory_locations table.

Building datasets

palms_build_days

Calculate day-level summaries from the palmsplus dataset

palms_build_multimodal

Build multimodal trips from trajectories

palms_build_palmsplus

Build the palmsplus dataset

palms_build_trajectories

Build trajectories from the palmsplus dataset

Helpers

palms_remove_tables

Remove all palmsplusr field and domain tables

palms_epoch

Get the epoch length of the PALMS dataset

palms_buffer

Return a buffer (polygon) of the input geometry.

palms_in_polygon

Check if points fall inside a polygon

palms_in_time

Check if points fall between a start and end time
